segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate, completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall, and it makes me feel a bit worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting everywhere, and it's just going to cause more problems if she doesn't turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside, and it looks so calm compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen, and it's frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
